body: It's sad, the vigil. More because r_c knows {PRONOUN/r_c/subject} should care and {VERB/r_c/don't/doesn't}, than out of any grief for m_c.
r_c refuses to sit vigil for m_c. {PRONOUN/m_c/subject/CAP} failed {PRONOUN/r_c/object} as a parent, guardian, and mentor. Why should r_c honor {PRONOUN/m_c/object} now?
r_c is called to m_c's vigil, but declines to speak. {PRONOUN/r_c/subject/CAP}{VERB/r_c/'re/'s} not sure {PRONOUN/r_c/subject}'d have anything good to say.
They may have shared blood, but nothing more. r_c doesn't show up to m_c's vigil.
m_c, dead? r_c snorts. Good riddance. {PRONOUN/m_c/subject/CAP} {VERB/m_c/were/was} no kind of parent.
When r_c is called to speak at m_c's vigil, {PRONOUN/r_c/subject} {VERB/r_c/cause/causes} a scene by recounting all the ways m_c failed {PRONOUN/r_c/object} as a parent.
r_c pretends to be sorry m_c is dead. At least now {PRONOUN/r_c/subject} can live {PRONOUN/r_c/poss} life without others associating {PRONOUN/r_c/object} with {PRONOUN/r_c/poss} parent.
r_c looks at m_c's body without much sorrow darkening {PRONOUN/r_c/poss} gaze. Kin means nothing without love, and their relationship had little of that.

r_c has half a mind to desecrate m_c's body. {PRONOUN/r_c/subject/CAP} {VERB/r_c/resist/resists}, for {PRONOUN/r_c/poss} Clanmates' sake, but {PRONOUN/r_c/subject} won't grieve {PRONOUN/r_c/poss} parent.

For all their differences, r_c cannot find it in {PRONOUN/r_c/self} to be glad m_c is dead. At least now {PRONOUN/r_c/subject} can move on from {PRONOUN/r_c/poss} troubled relationship with {PRONOUN/r_c/poss} parent.
The sight of {PRONOUN/r_c/poss} parent's body lying in the middle of camp fills r_c with a terrible, guilty relief.
No cat should feel glad that their parent is dead, r_c thinks. Unless that cat had a parent like m_c.

A Clanmate notices r_c's cold reaction to m_c's death and points out to {PRONOUN/r_c/object} that, for all their difficulties, m_c was still {PRONOUN/r_c/poss} parent. r_c rolls {PRONOUN/r_c/poss} eyes. m_c was no parent to {PRONOUN/r_c/object}.

r_c gathers {PRONOUN/r_c/poss} friends and suggests a celebratory hunt all together. When one of {PRONOUN/r_c/poss} Clanmates asks what the occasion is, r_c cheerfully replies that {PRONOUN/r_c/poss} parent is dead at last.
